reviewText:
This video is a bit antiquated in terms of the fast pace and styles of modern day.  The concepts are delivered slowly.  I don't love how the information is organized, and there's a lot of redundancy.
That said, I'm happy to have it because it talks about some of the nuances of getting into rebounding.  (and of course the how-tos of various movements)

I'm loving the effects of my Needak btw; I sleep and feel so much better.  If I lose my daily rhythm, all I have to do is start up again to be reminded of  those benefits.  So worth it.
